com.foreach.across.core

Class AcrossModuleSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.AcrossModuleSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.EnvironmentAware, org.springframework.core.env.PropertyResolver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcrossWebModuleSettings, GenericAcrossModuleSettings

    public abstract class AcrossModuleSettings
extends Object
implements org.springframework.context.EnvironmentAware, org.springframework.core.env.PropertyResolver
    Abstract class for module settings: configure the possible settings with their (optional) default values and informative description. This class provides an easy interface to query the configured settings.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
